analysis_topic.description: The topic or category being analyzed (passed at runtime). This field is for system use only and should never be mentioned in reasoning text.

answer.description: True if criteria met, false if data exists but fails criteria, null if required data does not exist

score_value.description: The point value of this question (extracted from question text or passed at runtime)

score_awarded.description: Points awarded: equals score_value if answer is true, otherwise 0

evidence.description: REQUIRED. For true/false: cite specific content or location proving data exists (e.g., 'Slide 3 states...', 'Team section shows...'). For null: must be null (proves data doesn't exist).

reasoning.description: Bullet points that MUST start with: 'Found:' (true), 'Issue:' (false), or 'Missing:' (null). Explain the determination without mentioning internal fields.

questions.description: Array of questions with their answers and reasoning (number of questions is variable)

max_score.description: The maximum possible score (passed at runtime). If 0, treat as Missing.

answerable_count.description: Count of questions that could be answered (true or false, not null)

pg_score.description: Performance grade: Missing (no questions answerable OR max_score=0), Incomplete (some questions not answerable), Red/Yellow/Green (all questions answerable, scored by percentage: <50%/50-80%/>=80%)
